title: Available This Week! Vinyl Flooring and Fully Renovated
map_address: 13530 Linden Ave N near N 137th St
posting_body: This is a 1 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 633 Sq.
The city of Seattle features an exceptional living experience at Cooper.
We invite you to tour our community to see for yourself why so many call Cooper in Seattle their home.
From our community amenities to our beautiful interior features, you will be sure to fall in love with our community.

Large Closets, Above the Range Microwave*, Premium Grade Carpet, Refrigerator, Dishwasher, View, Balconies*, Spacious Floorplans, Stainless Appliances*, Vinyl Planked Flooring*, Window Coverings, Views of Space Needle and Downtown Seattle*, Disposal, Garbage Disposal, 2" White Faux Wood Blinds*, Newly Renovated Units Offered

Elevator, Storage Space, 24-Hour Availability, On-site Maintenance, Resident Lounge with Cable TV and Wi-Fi Access, Fitness Center, Controlled Access Building, Clubhouse, Easy Online Rent Pay, Short Term Lease, Business Center, Interior Hallways, Underground Garage, Outdoor Pool
Photos and/or floor plans shown are representational and may not depict the exact layout or features of the available unit.
If currently occupied, the individual unit you've selected may not be available to tour.
Please contact our leasing team with any questions.
